Node.name: ThrottleAngle
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the throttle angle in degrees

Node.name: ThrottleTime
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the throttle time constant in seconds

Node.name: WOT
Node.Description: Gets the state of the Wide Open Throttle (WOT) switch

Node.name: Idle
Node.Description: Gets the state of the throttle idle position switch

Node.name: MotiveDemandLevel
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the motive demand from the driver (similar to throttle or accelerator position, but used for other powerplant types)

Node.name: BoostState
Node.Description: Gets and/or sets the state of the turbocharger or supercharger clutch

Node.name: BoostLevel
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the boost level (wastegate position) for turbochargers

Node.name: NOXVolume
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the nitrous oxide boost level (Manifold side pressure)

Node.name: NOXPressure
Node.Description: Gets the available Nitrous Oxide pressure in Pascals

Node.name: Powerplant
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the vehicle powerplant information

Node.name: PowerPlantType
Node.Description: Gets the type of powerplant(s).

Node.name: PowerplantIdentification
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer's name for the powerplant

Node.name: RatedPower
Node.Description: Gets the rated powerplant power in watts

Node.name: RatedTorque
Node.Description: Gets the rated powerplant torque in newton-meters

Node.name: MaximumRPM
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturerï¿½s stated maximum powerplant speed in Hz

Node.name: MaximumCoolantTemp
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer's maximum stated coolant temperature in degrees Kelvin

Node.name: MaximumOilTemp
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturerï¿½s maximum stated oil temperature in degrees Kelvin

Node.name: MaximumTemp
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturerï¿½s maximum stated operating temperature in degrees Kelvin

Node.name: CoolantType
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer's recommended coolant type according to the SAE reference spec (?)

Node.name: CoolantCapacity
Node.Description: Gets the Engine Coolant capacity in liters

Node.name: CoolantLevel
Node.Description: Gets the Engine Coolant capacity in liters

Node.name: OilType
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturers recommended oil type according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: OilWeight
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturers recommended engine oil weight according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: OilCapacity
Node.Description: Gets the Engine Oil capacity in liters

Node.name: OilLevel
Node.Description: Gets the Engine Oil level in lietrs

Node.name: <ICE-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node representing the ICE powerplant instance

Node.name: NumberCombCh
Node.Description: Gets the number of combustion chambers

Node.name: Displacement
Node.Description: Gets the engine displacement in liters

Node.name: <ICE-fuel-tank-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents an instance of the vehicle ICE fuel tanks

Node.name: FuelVolume
Node.Description: Gets the fuel tank instance capacity in liters

Node.name: FuelWeight
Node.Description: Gets the fuel tank instance capacity in kilograms

Node.name: FuelLevel
Node.Description: Gets the fuel tank instance level in percent of maximum

Node.name: FuelType
Node.Description: Gets the vehicle's primary externally provided fuel type

Node.name: FuelGrade
Node.Description: Gets the vehicle's primary externally provided fuel grade in units corresponding to the fuel type. E.g. (R+M)/2 octane for gasoline)

Node.name: <Electric-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node representing the characteristics of the electric motor instance

Node.name: MotorIdentification
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer's name for the motor.

Node.name: MotorType
Node.Description: Gets the type of electric motor (not sure what this is)

Node.name: MaximumCurrent
Node.Description: Gets the maimum current for the motor in amps

Node.name: OperatingVoltage
Node.Description: Gets the operating voltage of the motor in volts

Node.name: <battery-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific battery instance. Name must be one of:

Node.name: ChargeLevel
Node.Description: Gets the Charge level of the battery instance in percent of full capacity

Node.name: BattCapacity
Node.Description: Gets the capacity of the battery instance in Ampere-Hours

Node.name: BatteryState
Node.Description: Gets the battery state

Node.name: Transmission
Node.Description: Interior node representing the characteristics of the transmission

Node.name: TransmissionType
Node.Description: Gets the transmission type in the vehicle

Node.name: TransmissionIdentification
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer's designation for the transmission.

Node.name: GearNames
Node.Description: Gets an array containing the gear numbers and their corresponding names (negative gear numbers correspond to reverse gears) (####??)

Node.name: ModeNames
Node.Description: Gets an array containing the operating mode numbers and their corresponding names (###???)

Node.name: Mode
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the Transmission operating Mode

Node.name: Gear
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the Transmission operating Gear

Node.name: GearSelectorPosition
Node.Description: Gets the current positionof the gear selector

Node.name: Ratio
Node.Description: Gest and/or sets the ratio of a continuously variable transmission

Node.name: MaximumTemp
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturerï¿½s maximum recommended operating temperature in degrees Kelvin

Node.name: MaximumTorque
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturerï¿½s maximum recommended operating torque in newton-meters

Node.name: NumberInputs
Node.Description: Gets the number of input shafts

Node.name: NumberOutputs
Node.Description: Gets the number of output shafts

Node.name: GearRatios
Node.Description: Gets a 3-dimensional array containing the gear ratios indexed by gear number, input shaft number and output shaft number. Form is: Ratio(Gear,Input,Output). (### there is no such thing as an array)

Node.name: TransFluidType
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturerï¿½s recommended brake fluid type according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: TransFluidWeight
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturers recommended transmission oil weight according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: TransFluidCapacity
Node.Description: Gets the Brake Fluid capacity in liters

Node.name: TransFluidLevel
Node.Description: Getsa the transmission fluid level in percent of maximum

Node.name: TransferCase
Node.Description: Interior node representing the characteristics of the transfer case

Node.name: TransferCaseType
Node.Description: Gets the transfer case type in the vehicle

Node.name: TransCaseIdentification
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer's designation for the transmission.

Node.name: GearNames
Node.Description: Gets an array containing the gear numbers and their corresponding names (negative gear numbers correspond to reverse gears)

Node.name: ModeNames
Node.Description: Gets an array containing the operating mode numbers and their corresponding names

Node.name: ModeNames
Node.Description: Gets the names of the transfer case modes

Node.name: MaximumTemp
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturerï¿½s maximum recommended operating temperature in degrees Kelvin

Node.name: MaximumTorque
Node.Description: Gets the maximum rated torque for the transfer case in newton-meters

Node.name: NumberInputs
Node.Description: Gets the number of input shafts

Node.name: NumberOutputs
Node.Description: Gets the number of output shafts

Node.name: GearRatios
Node.Description: Gets a 3-dimensional array containing the input to output gear ratios indexed by gear number, input shaft number and output shaft number. Form is: Ratio(Gear,Input,Output)

Node.name: Mode
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the Transfer Case operating Mode

Node.name: Gear
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the Transfer Case operating Gear

Node.name: TClFluidType
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturers recommended transfer case fluid type oil weight according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: TCFluidWeight
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturers recommended transfer case fluid weight according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: TCFluidLevel
Node.Description: Gets the level of the transfer case fluid in percent of maximum

Node.name: <differential-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node representing the differential instance

Node.name: DiffType
Node.Description: Gets the type of the differential instance

Node.name: DiffIdentification
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer's designation for the differential instance

Node.name: FinalDriveRatio
Node.Description: Gets the final drive output to input ratio of the differential instance

Node.name: DifferentialFluidType
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturers recommended differential or transaxle fluid type oil weight according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: DifferentialFluidWeight
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturers recommended differential or transaxle fluid weight according to the applicable specification for the OBD region

Node.name: DifferentialFluidLevel
Node.Description: Gets the level of the differential fluid in percent of maximum

Node.name: LockState
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the lock state of a manual locking differential
